name: Gravity Architect
description:
Gravity Architect is a Virtual Reality 3D puzzle game where every tiny voxel of matter has a gravitational pull. This is the first game built with the SculptrVR Engine! Place mass into the universe to guide a stream of particles through each of the goals.

Supported platforms: HTC Vive, Oculus Touch, & Google Daydream.

Gravity Architect has 11 levels and 3 difficulty settings. The three difficulty settings change the size of the target spheres.

Estimated play time on easy: ~1 hour.

Estimated play time on medium: ~2 hours.

Estimated play time on hard: good luck..

Vive Instructions:

  • Trigger: Place material
  • Grip: Reposition universe
  • App button: toggle delete mode on your sphere
  • Point your right-hand lasers at the panel behind your left hand to change levels.

Oculus Instructions:

  • Trigger: Place material
  • Grip: Reposition universe
  • A/X: toggle delete mode on your sphere
  • Point your right-hand lasers at the panel behind your left hand to change levels.

Daydream Instructions:

  • The touchpad is partitioned into 5 buttons (left, right, top, bottom, center).
  • Rotate your wrist to adjust the depth of the sculpting ball
  • Center press: Place material
  • Top press: Toggle delete mode
  • Left/Right press: Undo/Redo
  • Bottom Press: teleport 0.5m in the direction you're pointing
  • App button: bring up level selection menu
